definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to stare blankly/to be stunned/to be lost in thought
lit. dumb as a wooden chicken (idiom); fig. dumbstruck
to gape at/to stare blankly/to stare in rapture/to stare in awe

sentences.english: All of them insisted on my staying with them a few days longer.
sentences.chinese: 他們所有的人都堅持要我再跟他們多呆幾天時間。

sentences.english: It was raining cats and dogs outside, so we had to stay at home.
sentences.chinese: 外面大雨滂沱，我們只好呆在家裏。

sentences.english: Sometimes, he gets so sulky that he just stays in his tent and fasts.
sentences.chinese: 有時候他就只會呆在自己的帳篷裏不喫東西生悶氣。

sentences.english: If you had stayed out all night in the snow,you might have frozen to death.
sentences.chinese: 你要是在外面的雪地裏呆上一晚準會凍死。

sentences.english: Can i extend my stay two mors hours?
sentences.chinese: 我可以再呆兩個小時嗎？

sentences.english: He is now quadriplegic and confined to a wheelchair.
sentences.chinese: 現在的他四肢麻痹，只能呆在輪椅上。

sentences.english: Word of it has spread and you have dishonoured yourself here in Benares.
sentences.chinese: 此事傳遍了貝拿勒斯，呆在這裏你只有恥辱。

sentences.english: With a final beat, and Pedrito's cave burst with hot light.
sentences.chinese: 隨着最後一下敲擊聲，強光突然射入帕吉特呆的洞穴。

sentences.english: He was happy, however, that he was not in the cell.
sentences.chinese: 不過，他還是挺開心的，因爲他不用呆在牢房裏。

sentences.english: If you want to appear smarter, hang aroud someone stupider.
sentences.chinese: 要想顯得聰明，整天和笨人呆在一起。

sentences.english: We are all rather cross, and have rows about luggage.
sentences.chinese: 我們橫七豎八地和一排行李呆在一起。

sentences.english: Holiday period everybody stops all moving dull at home, or exits to listen to chant scripture.
sentences.chinese: 節日期間大家停止一切活動呆在家裏，或出去聽唸經。

sentences.english: But that son is now a junior in high school, and he won't be in the house forever.
sentences.chinese: 不過小兒女如今已經上了高外，他不會永久呆在家裏。

sentences.english: Stay in the car until the shaking stops.
sentences.chinese: 直到震動結束前呆在車裏。

sentences.english: Should I stay on for the next semester?
sentences.chinese: 我下學期還應該呆在這裏嗎？

sentences.english: He remained a long time thus.

definition: to stare blankly/to be stunned/to be lost in thought
to have nothing to do/to idle one's time away (idiom)
nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to
to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining
to have nothing to do/to have time on one's hands
a while/a spell/a short time/a burst
to roll/to wander around/to appear repeatedly
a moment/a while/in a moment/also pr. [yi1 hui3]
to look distracted/to stare blankly/distracted/blank/(coll.) unexpectedly/rash/rashly
